title: 内部错误导致整个服务器加不了！
author: 啊木哥
txt_content:
02.10 20:00:11 [Server] INFO Forced SL_XH to defined location.
02.10 20:00:11 [Server] INFO Detected the PlayerJoinEvent of player SL_XH
02.10 20:00:11 [Connect] User SL_XH, IP:
02.10 20:00:11 [Server] INFO Server side modded connection established
02.10 20:00:11 [Server] INFO Ness_King离开了落日之都 
02.10 20:00:10 [Disconnect] User Ness_King has disconnected, reason: Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.timeout.ReadTimeoutException
02.10 20:00:10 [Server] INFO shit离开了落日之都 
02.10 20:00:10 [Disconnect] User shit has disconnected, reason: Disconnected
02.10 20:00:10 [Server] INFO pear789456321离开了落日之都 
02.10 20:00:10 [Disconnect] User pear789456321 has disconnected, reason: Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.timeout.ReadTimeoutException
02.10 20:00:10 [Server] INFO 169381954离开了落日之都 
全部都这样
崩溃：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=507873&page=1#pid9146898
召唤大触：@snowclay @lichi2050 
帮忙解决呀QWQ谢谢各位了

replies.author: 啊木哥
replies.txt_content:
snowclay 发表于 2015-10-2 21:09
插件列表发一下
http://yun.baidu.com/s/1gdrX1fl#render-type=grid-view
百度云下载一下

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2015-10-2 20:28 编辑 

你发的这个部分只有提示玩家掉线了，插件表列我暂时不需要，你另外那个帖子也没有log文件，很难找到问题啊。
请把完整的LOG发出来。如果有崩溃信息（crash-report）也发出来。
